mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sns ( userNo, snsContent, snsCreateTime ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{snsContent}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT snsNo FROM sns WHERE snsCheck is null
mapper.update: UPDATE sns SET snsCheck = 1 WHERE snsNo = #{snsNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO snsImage ( snsNo, snsImageUrl ) VALUES ( #{snsNo}, #{snsImageUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.snsNo, s.userNo, s.snsContent, s.snsCreateTime, u.userProfileImage , u.userNickname FROM sns s, user u WHERE s.userNo = u.userNo ORDER BY s.snsNo DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT s.snsNo, s.userNo, s.snsContent, s.snsCreateTime, u.userProfileImage , u.userNickname FROM sns s, user u WHERE s.userNo = u.userNo AND s.userNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY s.snsNo DESC

SELECT s.snsNo, s.userNo, s.snsContent, s.snsCreateTime, u.userProfileImage , u.userNickname FROM sns s, user u WHERE s.userNo = u.userNo and u.userNo = #{userNo} and s.snsCreateTime >= (CURDATE()-INTERVAL 5 DAY) ORDER BY s.snsNo DESC
SELECT userNo FROM follow WHERE followUserNo = #{userNo}
SELECT s.snsNo, s.userNo, s.snsContent, s.snsCreateTime, s.snsUpdateTime, u.userNickname, u.userProfileImage FROM sns s, user u WHERE s.snsNo = #{snsNo} AND s.userNo = u.userNo

SELECT s.snsNo, s.snsReplyNo , s.userNo, s.snsReplyContent,s.snsReplyCreateTime, s.snsReplyUpdateTime, u.userNickname, u.userProfileImage FROM snsReply s, user u WHERE s.userNo = u.userNo AND snsNo = #{snsNo};
